channel.title: Cromscape null items.?
channel.description: hi, i just got a deltascape client and tried to run my server tru there, but when i start the server all my bandos armadyl etc items become null.? why is this? im going to get the server online tru dedicated so thats why i need a client. clould someone pls help me

item.title: Cromscape null items.?
item.dc:creator: @crom170 crom170
item.description:
@crom170 wrote:

THX I MANAGED TO FIX IT, BUT NOW I GOT A NEW PROBLEM.
when i compile i get this message:
followhandler.java:10: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable followplayer
location: class client
c.followplayer = followplayer;
not: stream.java or override a deprecated API.
note: recompile with -xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error

any one know how to fix this?

Read full topic

item.title: Cromscape null items.?
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

umm if your using a different client that the one intended for the source then i think i know what happend when you add items you have to add them to 2 main places the item.cfg and the class8 in the client The class8 text file contains the ints for the item along with the item id so the ints can identify the item they are for. So if you have a BGS (bandos godsword) and the class8 says the the bgs ints are for item id 365 and your server says the bsg item id is 6555 then when you spawn item 6555 you will get what ever item that is with bgs stats

I will be looking back to this post for further help please reply!

Read full topic
